docs.lead_paragraph: A study in Uganda has found that washing the penis minutes after sex increased the risk of acquiring H.I.V. in uncircumcised men.

headline.main: Washing After Sex May Raise H.I.V. Risk
headline.print_headline: Washing After Sex May Raise H.I.V. Risk

docs.snippet: A study in Uganda has found that washing the penis minutes after sex increased the risk of acquiring H.I.V. in uncircumcised men.

docs.lead_paragraph: ABOUT THE SERIES — They are the leading causes of illness and death in the United States today: heart disease, cancer, stroke, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, diabetes and Alzheimer’s disease, in that order. And they have a lot in common.
docs.snippet: ABOUT THE SERIES — They are the leading causes of illness and death in the United States today: heart disease, cancer, stroke, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, diabetes and Alzheimer’s disease, in that order. And they have a lot in common.

docs.lead_paragraph: “[A]mong those who have studied the balance sense in depth . . .  many would argue that without it we might not have much use for the other senses.”

headline.main: ‘Balance: In Search of the Lost Sense’

docs.snippet: “[A]mong those who have studied the balance sense in depth . . .  many would argue that without it we might not have much use for the other senses.”
